title: New: p.r.i.n.t.s. – work this out
content:
Can I get away with saying that the beginning of this debut track from LA’s p.

r.i.n.t.s. sounds quite a lot like Karma Police? Anyway, work this out is a dreamy masterpiece, hinting at touches of 70’s psychedelia, whilst the songwriting itself is much more ‘modern’. Imagine a really sad Best Coast, and you sort of get an idea of what this track is all about. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
